transArray.content: I was on a business trip nearby and stayed one night temporarily. I chose this hotel. The girl at the front desk was very helpful and the room was clean and tidy. It was great.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel rooms and the room ladies. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products and services we deliver are of reliable quality. , cleanliness and safety come first. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. At the same time, we are very grateful for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you at all times. Come back at any time. All the staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel are looking forward to your next stay. Thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
